net.antidot.api.search

Class FacetRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.antidot.api.search.FacetRegistry

  • public class FacetRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    Register for all configured facets.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FacetRegistry

        public FacetRegistry()

    • Method Detail

      • addFacet

        public void addFacet(Facet facet)
        Appends new facet to the list of registered facets.

        Notes:

        • Facets are identified by their id, so only one facet can be registered with a given identifier.
        • Order of added facets influence directly order of facets in result from Antidot search engine.
        Parameters:
        facet - [in] new facet to be added.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when a facet with same id has already been registered.

      • getFacets

        public java.util.Collection<Facet> getFacets()
        Retrieves ordered list of configured facets.
        Returns:
        unmodifiable list of facets.

      • getFacet

        public Facet getFacet(java.lang.String facetId)
        Retrieves specific facet configuration.
        Parameters:
        facetId - [in] identifier of the facet to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        facet configuration.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when requested facet identifier has not been registered yet.
